title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Lucas Moura, Zlatan Ibrahimovic, Andrea Belotti
description: All the latest Man Utd transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Wednesday, January 10.
content:
Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic is expected to leave Old Trafford later this year, according to the Daily Mirror.
United are reportedly considering replacements for the Swede, and he could potentially leave before he is out of contract at the end of the season.
Torino striker Andrea Belotti is one of three options being explored by United as a replacement for Ibrahimovic.
The Daily Express report the Italy international, who has scored seven goals in 21 appearances for club and country this term, is top of United's transfer wishlist and their first option for replacing Ibrahimovic.
The other two options involve Anthony Martial and Marcus Rashford playing up from more regularly, or signing a young striker to be an understudy to Romelu Lukaku.
